parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden transmission slippage or failure can cause the vehicle to lose power and control, leading to accidents or near-misses, potentially resulting in injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The transmission slips out of gear
the vehicle loses power
the vehicle stalls or dies
the transmission makes unusual noises or vibrations.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Clutch Lining Failure/Dual Mass Flywheel Issue
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the clutch lining and/or dual mass flywheel can cause the vehicle to buck and jerk forward, leading to loss of control and potential low-impact accidents.
symptoms: The vehicle bucks or jerks forward
especially in stop-and-go traffic
the clutch pedal feels unusual or spongy
the vehicle experiences unusual vibrations or noises.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The continuous illumination of the airbag warning light can indicate a potential fault in the airbag system, which can lead to the failure of the airbags to deploy in the event of a crash, increasing the risk of injury or fatality.
symptoms: The airbag warning light comes on and stays on every time the vehicle is started
the airbag warning light does not turn off.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Door Handle Failure and Trunk Latch Breakage
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the outside door handles and trunk latch can cause inconvenience, difficulty in entering or exiting the vehicle, and potential safety risks in emergency situations.
symptoms: Door handles become inoperable
unable to open doors
trunk latch breaks
unable to open trunk
sheet metal around screws breaks
screws become loose.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear subframe mounts can cause the subframe to detach from the unibody, leading to loss of vehicle control, accidents, and potentially fatalities.
symptoms: Cracking or breaking of the unibody sheet metal at the attachment points
rear subframe detachment from the vehicle
unusual noises or vibrations from the rear of the vehicle
loss of vehicle stability or control.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A defective hood latch can cause the hood to open while driving, obstructing the driver's view and potentially leading to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The hood opens suddenly while driving
the hood latch disengages without warning
the hood is not securely closed.
